headlines.description: Defender Rasmus Kristensen scored a second-half equaliser to give Leeds United a share of the points in a thrilling 2-2 draw with Newcastle United.
headlines.shortLinkText: Leeds, Newcastle play out dramatic 2-2 draw

headlines.description: — Jacob Ramsey and Douglas Luiz revived Aston Villa’s charge for European qualification by beating Tottenham 2-1 in the English Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Aston Villa revives European charge by beating Tottenham as Kane scores again

headlines.description: Nottingham Forest grabbed a precious point at Chelsea in the Premier League on Saturday, thanks to two goals from Nigerian forward Taiwo Awoniyi.
headlines.shortLinkText: Forest rescue battling 2-2 draw at Chelsea

headlines.description: Eberechi Eze scored twice as Crystal Palace beat a disappointing Bournemouth 2-0 in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Eze double helps Palace ease past Bournemouth

headlines.description: — Manchester United's home form looks like being enough to earn the team a return to the Champions League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man United beats Wolves and back on track for Champions League

headlines.description: Southampton were relegated from the Premier League after being beaten 2-0 at home by Fulham on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Southampton relegated from Prem after 11 years
